channel.title: Firefox on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Firefox on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Forming form guidelines
item.description: Who knew web design could be so… academic? Since I got back from @media I’ve been hard at work on a set of guidelines which ideally will one day guide the interaction and styling of all forms on the myriad of BCIT web applications though right now will only be applied to anything in the ‘public web’ look and feel.Â I don’t think I’ve done this much research since I finished university.

item.title: This time it's not IE.
item.description: Wow, FireFox does not play nice with styling legends. FireFox, I’m not mad, I’m just disappointed.

item.title: Delicious + FireFox + Snap Links
item.description: I keep up on my favorite blogs and web comics by book marking them all in Firefox and then using the “open all in tabs” option that FireFox so nicely includes to open all the book marks at once. That way I can keep track of which ones I’ve read by closing them once I’m done :) Yeah, it’s lazy I know. I’ve been wanting to have access to my bookmarks when I’m away from my home computer (who doesn’t) so I jumped on the del.
